import React from 'react'; import avatar from '../../../assets/img/ava.jpg'; import styles from './popUpMessage.module.css' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import { reduxForm, Field } from 'redux-form'; import { Textarea, createField } from '../FormControls/FormControls'; import { required} from '../../../utils/validators/validator'; import { push } from 'react-router-redux' const PopUpMessage = ({ user, closePopup, messageFromPopUp }) => { debugger; return

{ messageFromPopUp(data, user) }}/>
} const addMessagePopup = (props) => { return
{createField(null, 'messagePopup', [required], 'textarea', null, null,{cols: 57.5, rows: 8})}
} const AddMessagePopupFormRedux = reduxForm({form: 'message-popup'})(addMessagePopup); export default PopUpMessage;
